summary.note1: This amount is for reference only. Actual costs will be determined by on-site inspection.
summary.note2: If you have other requirements, please specify in the notes for a custom quote.

hero.title: About Sodax Clean
hero.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services that create healthier, more comfortable environments for our clients.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded with a simple mission: to provide Sydney residents and businesses with reliable, high-quality cleaning services they can trust. We understand that a clean space is more than just aesthetics – it is about creating a healthy environment for you, your family, or your employees.
story.content2: From our humble beginnings as a small team of passionate cleaners, we have grown to serve hundreds of satisfied customers across Sydney. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction remains at the heart of everything we do.
story.content3: Every member of our team shares our core values: integrity, attention to detail, and a genuine passion for creating pristine spaces.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do, from our cleaning methods to how we treat our clients.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every cleaning task is performed to the highest standards with attention to every detail.

care.title: Customer Care
care.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We listen to your needs and tailor our services to exceed your expectations.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: We use environmentally responsible cleaning products that are safe for your family, pets, and the planet.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the Sodax Clean Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who trust us with their cleaning needs.

hero.title: Our Cleaning Services
hero.subtitle: Professional cleaning solutions tailored to your specific needs. From regular maintenance to specialized deep cleaning services.

home.title: Home Cleaning
home.description: Regular residential cleaning services to keep your home pristine and comfortable.

deep.title: Deep Cleaning
deep.description: Comprehensive deep cleaning service for every corner of your home.

office.title: Office Cleaning
office.description: Professional commercial cleaning services for productive work environments.

construction.title: Post-Construction
construction.description: Thorough cleaning after renovations or construction projects.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Getting your space professionally cleaned is simple and hassle-free.
